author: sebb
msg: Use dependencyManagement for junit version management

author: sdeboy
msg: If command-line config URL is provided, display that value in autoconfig field but persist the last-saved config URL field (allows switching between command-line URL and default auto-config URL configurations)

author: hwright
msg: (_run_prog): Remove all the custom stdout/stderr redirect handling, in favor
of the subprocess module's built-in facilities.

author: sdeboy
msg: Weird Swing HTML/table cell renderer issue - if first character is a forward slash, the text isn't displayed at all.
Workaround is to render the leading slash character using the ASCII html code for forward slash (/)
